title: Q&A with Book Signing: Isobelle Carmody
description: Join us for an intimate evening with renowned author Isobelle Carmody, as we explore her fantasy and sci-fi worlds, with an opportunity to have your books personally signed.
imgalttext: A portrait photo of Isobelle Carmody.

title: Spoken Word Poetry - The meaning of Joy
description: Let poetry ignite your soul as we explore the essence of joy through captivating spoken word performances.
imgalttext: A photo of a girl with arms stretched wide beside her, staring out over an ocean at sunset.

title: Comedy Central Stand-up sessions
description: Get ready for a night of laughter with our Comedy Central Stand-up Sessions, featuring talented comedians who will leave you in stitches.
imgalttext: A close-up photo of a microphone in a music club.

title: High Tea Sunday
description: Elevate your Sunday afternoon with a sophisticated High Tea experience, featuring exquisite teas and an array of sweet and savory delights. Every sunday from 3pm-5pm. Bookings essential.
imgalttext: A high-tea tower of scones and assorted baked goods.

title: Learn to bake: Apple Pie
description: Roll up your sleeves and embark on a baking adventure as Bella reveals the secrets of creating her famous Apple Pie. Limited places available.
imgalttext: A close-up photo of a microphone in a music club.

title: Coffee Appreciation for beginners
description: Delve into the world of coffee with our Coffee Appreciation session for beginners, where you'll learn the secrets of brewing the perfect cup of joe. Limited places available.
imgalttext: Three hands holding cups of various kinds of coffee together.
